代.definition: to be a substitute for; to act on behalf of; to replace; to substitute; generation; dynasty; age; period; (historical) era; (geological) eon

代之以.definition: (has been) replaced with; (its) place has been taken by

代人受過.definition: to take the blame for sb else; to be made a scapegoat

代代.definition: from generation to generation; generation after generation

代代相傳.definition: passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down

代償.definition: (medical) compensation; to repay a debt or obligation in place of sb else

代利斯.definition: Dallys, Algerian seaport and naval base

代勞.definition: to do sth in place of sb else

代填.definition: to fill in a form for sb else

代孕.definition: to serve as a surrogate mother; surrogacy

代字.definition: abbreviated name of an entity (e.g. 皖政, a short name for 安徽省人民政府); code name; (old) pronoun

代宗.definition: Daizong, temple name of seventh Ming emperor Jingtai 景泰[Jing3 tai4]

代寫.definition: to write as substitute for sb; a ghost writer; plagiarism

代幣.definition: token (used instead of money for slot machines, in game arcades etc)

代收.definition: to receive sth on another's behalf

代數基本定理.pinyin: dài shù jī běn dìng lǐ

代數學基本定理.pinyin: dài shù xué jī běn dìng lǐ
代數學基本定理.definition: fundamental theorem of algebra (every polynomial has a complex root)

代書.definition: to write on sb's behalf; a scrivener (who writes legal documents or letters for others)

代替.definition: to replace; to take the place of

代替父母.definition: in place of sb's parents; in loco parentis (law)

代步.definition: to get around using a conveyance (car, bicycle, sedan chair etc); to ride (or drive); means of transportation

代步車.definition: vehicle; (esp.) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)

代為.definition: to do sth on behalf of sb else

代班.definition: (Tw) to take over sb's job; to substitute for

代理.definition: to act on behalf of sb in a responsible position; to act as an agent or proxy; surrogate; (computing) proxy

代禱.definition: to pray on behalf of sb

代稱.definition: alternative name; to refer to sth by another name; antonomasia

代筆.definition: to write on behalf of sb; to ghostwrite

代管.definition: to administer; to manage; to hold in trust or escrow

代縣.definition: Dai county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi

代罪.definition: to act as a scapegoat; to take the blame for sb else

代考.definition: to take a test or exam for sb

代行.definition: to act as a substitute; to act on sb's behalf

代表.definition: representative; delegate; CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4],名[ming2]; to represent; to stand for; on behalf of; in the name of

代表人物.definition: representative individual (of a school of thought)

代表作.definition: representative work (of an author or artist)

代言.definition: to be a spokesperson; to be an ambassador (for a brand); to endorse

代誌.definition: (Tw) (coll.) matter; thing (from Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [tāi-tsì], equivalent to Mandarin 事情[shi4qing5])

代課.definition: to teach as substitute for absent teacher

代辦.definition: to act for sb else; to act on sb's behalf; an agent; a diplomatic representative; a chargé d'affaires

代銷.definition: to sell as agent; to sell on commission (e.g. insurance policies); proxy sale (of stocks)

代駕.definition: to drive a vehicle for its owner (often as a paid service for sb who has consumed alcohol) (abbr. for 代理駕駛|代理驾驶[dai4 li3 jia4 shi3]); substitute driver (abbr. for 代駕司機|代驾司机[dai4 jia4 si1 ji1])
